about_the_game:
An additional music theme for the game Flying Pengy includes two music tracks for the Main Menu, In-game screen, and event sounds. The music tracks were specifically composed for this game.

When DLC is installed, the game will automatically randomly choose the music theme to play.

List of files:
mb-menu.ogg -- Main menu music
mb-ingame.ogg -- In-game music
mb-winlevel.ogg -- a sound for the "win level" event
mb-gameover.ogg -- a sound for the "game over" event
